text: Road signs in United Arab Emirates are modelled on the British and SADC road sign system that are regulated by the Road Traffic Authority (RTA) Dubai and Department of Transport (DoT) Abu Dhabi. ==Gallery== ===Regulatory signs=== ====Control signs==== Stop sign (United Arab Emirates).svg|Stop SADC road sign R2.svg|Give way SADC road sign R2.1-RHT.svg|Give way to pedestrians SADC road sign R3.svg|Do not enter Bangladesh road sign A38 L.svg|One-way roadway (left) Bangladesh road sign A38 R.svg|One-way roadway (right) Bangladesh road sign A37.svg|One-way roadway (forward) SADC road sign R6-RHT.svg|Give way to oncoming traffic ====Mandatory signs==== UAE Minimum Speed Limit - 60 kmh.svg|Minimum speed limit (60 km/h) France road sign B21a2.svg|Keep left France road sign B21a1.svg|Keep right France road sign B21-2.svg|Turn left France road sign B21-1.svg|Turn right France road sign B21b.svg|Straight ahead France road sign B21c2.svg|Turn left ahead France road sign B21c1.svg|Turn right ahead SADC road sign R110.svg|Pedestrians only SADC road sign R111.svg|Cyclists only Hungary road sign D-017.svg|Roundabout ====Prohibition signs==== UAE Speed Limit - 60 kmh.svg|Speed limit (60 km/h) SADC road sign R206.svg|No excessive moise SADC road sign R209.svg|No left turn SADC road sign R210.svg|No right turn SADC road sign R213-RHT.svg|No U-turn SADC road sign R214-RHT.svg|No overtaking SADC road sign R218.svg|No pedestrians SADC road sign R219.svg|No entry for cyclists SADC road sign R222.svg|No entry for motorcyclists SADC road sign R229.svg|No entry for goods vehicles SADC road sign R236.svg|No agricultural vehicles SADC road sign R237.svg|No animal-drawn vehicles SADC road sign R240.svg|No towed vehicles SADC road sign R242.svg|No motor vehicles ====Parking control signs==== UK traffic sign 636.svg|No parking UK traffic sign 642.svg|No stopping Bangladesh road sign C3.svg|Parking ====Freeway control signs==== Nederlands verkeersbord G1.svg|Start of TW336.svg|Roadworks SADC road sign TW338-RHT.svg|Loose stones SADC road sign W339.svg|Other danger SADC road sign TW342.svg|Dangerous shoulder SADC road sign W348-RHT.svg|Quay or river bank ahead SADC
